oai_dc:dc.dc:title: DENSE INDEXING SCHEME FOR LIMITED CONFIGURATION-INTERACTION CALCULATIONS WITH DETERMINANTAL BASIS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BAJPAI, N
SARMA, CR
PALDUS, J
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: unitary-group-approach
electron correlation-problem
direct ci method
clifford-algebra
space
molecule
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An indexing scheme for determinantal states of spin-orbitals that enables a dense contiguous labeling of configurations even for truncated limited configuration-interaction expansions of the many-electron wavefunction is presented.
